message: Let's split it 50/50, easy and fair!
I'll give you 300k, but I think I deserve more
You're lowballing me, I want more!
I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I think this is a fair split!
I'll give you 400k, but I think I'm worth more
You're not giving me enough credit for my negotiation skills!
I'm willing to give you a small chance to catch up, but don't expect more!
I'll give you 200k, but I'm not giving up yet
You're being ridiculous, I'm not accepting such a lowball offer!
You're running out of chances, take it or leave it!
I'll give you 100k, but I'm not giving up
You're being unreasonable, I'm not settling for peanuts!
You're running out of time, take this or walk away!
I'll give you 50k, but I'm not giving up yet
You're not even trying to be serious, I'm out of patience!
You've had your chances, now it's time for me to take the lion's share!
I'll give you the whole thing, I'd rather have nothing
Fine, I'll take the whole thing. Congratulations, you've managed to negotiate yourself out of a fortune!
